name: Sales Dashboard
backend_requirements: 1. Sale model: id, date, amount (decimal), category, description
2. GET /api/sales - return all sales, support date range filter
3. GET /api/sales/summary - return totals by category and month
4. Seed with sample data if database is empty
frontend_requirements: 1. Sales table with date, amount, category, description columns
2. Total sales displayed prominently at top
3. Simple bar chart showing sales by category (Chart.js or similar)
4. Date range filter (this month, last month, custom)

api_endpoints.description: List all sales (supports ?start_date= and ?end_date= for date range filtering)
Get totals by category and month
